title: Wu Liuqi Zhi Zui Qiang Fa Xing Shi (Scissor Seven)
synopsis: Seeking to recover his memories, a scissor-wielding hairdresser, bungling quasi-assassin stumbles into a struggle for power among two feuding factions.
